meaningMnemonic: You are given some <radical>gold</radical> to <radical>oversee</radical> a <kanji>model</kanji>. You are a famous architect, so you get a lot of gold for overseeing the construction of models like this one.
readingMnemonic: As the <kanji>model</kanji> nears completion, you realize it's taking the shape of Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん). Was that what this was supposed to look like? You were so busy overseeing the gold in your pocket, you forgot!
